# Advanced web scraping

Navigate to https://www.ourcommons.ca/Members/en/search.

Can you scrape the Current Members into a data.frame (or tibble?)

```{r}

install.packages("rvest")
library("rvest")


url <- "https://www.ourcommons.ca/Members/en/search"
html <- read_html(url) 
 


pname <- html_nodes(html, xpath='//div[@class="ce-mip-mp-name"]') %>%
 html_text()
 
party <- html_nodes(html, xpath='//div[@class="ce-mip-mp-party"]') %>%
 html_text()
 
constituency <- html_nodes(html, xpath='//div[@class="ce-mip-mp-constituency"]')%>%
 html_text

province <-html_nodes(html, xpath='//div[@class="ce-mip-mp-province"]')%>%
 html_text

mps <- data.frame("Name" = pname, "Party" = party, "Constituency" = constituency, "Province" = province)

```
